title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Networks at scale and how to automate operations  (NET323)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模网络及如何自动化运维 (NET323)
abstract: Join us in this Code Talk to explore how to leverage AWS Serverless services to automate AWS networking operations across multiple AWS accounts. In this session, we will showcase AWS Cloud WAN to walk through building a global network using policy-as-code. Learn how to automate the connection and validation of VPCs and hybrid environments, while ensuring architecture security and standards are met without any manual intervention. By the end of the session, attendees will build a solution that can help reduce manual operations, enforce standardization, and efficiently manage networking infrastructure at scale.
abstract_cn: 加入我们的代码讲座，探索如何利用 AWS 无服务器服务在多个 AWS 账户中自动化 AWS 网络操作。在本次会议中，我们将展示 AWS Cloud WAN，演示如何使用策略即代码构建全球网络。了解如何自动化 VPC 和混合环境的连接和验证，同时确保架构安全性和标准得到满足，无需任何手动干预。在会议结束时，参与者将构建一个解决方案，帮助减少手动操作、强制执行标准化并高效管理大规模网络基础设施。
